author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Can I use snipping tool on the midterm?
question: Could I use snipping tool (or any other screen-capture method) so that I wouldn't have to scroll up and down to find data definitions/defined constants/problem instructions? Or should I just stick to copy+pasting the needed information to right above where I'm coding and comment it out.
instructor_answer: The exam instructions are clear about what you can use, and it does not include any external tools.
